item.title: Publications
item.description: Ph.D. Thesis Here is my Ph.D. thesis manuscript. You can find the corresponding slides there, and a video recording of the defense itself there. Preprints Pooladian A-A., Divol, V., Niles-Weed J., (2023). Minimax estimation of discontinuous optimal transport maps: The semi-discrete case. arxiv Divol, V., Niles-Weed J., Pooladian A-A. (2022). Optimal transport map estimation in general function spaces. arxiv Divol, V. (2021). A short proof on the rate of convergence of the empirical measure for the Wasserstein distance.

item.title: Teaching
item.description: Notes Some teaching notes on basic ML algorithms. Notes on boosting Notes on decision trees and random forests Mathematical Tools for Data Science (Spring 2022) In Spring 2021, I taught with Carlos Fernandez-Granda the Mathematical Tools for Data Science course in the Master’s in Data Science at NYU (DS-GA 1013). The full lecture notes can be found here. Week Lecture notes Manuscript notes Homeworks Solutions 1 Empirical risk minimization Manuscript 1 Homework 1 Solution 1 2 Convex optimization Manuscript 2 Homework 2 Solution 2 3 Kernel methods Manuscript 3 Homework 3 Solution 3 4 Local averaging methods Manuscript 4 Homework 4 Solution 4 5 Clustering methods Manuscript 5 Homework 5 Solution 5 5 Stochastic convex optimization Manuscript 6 Homework 6 Solution 6
